DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , tolerability immunogenicity study vaccine 13vPnC 23vPS old , healthy subject previously receive dose 23vPS least 5 year ago . It also evaluate safety , tolerability immunogenicity dose 13vPnC 1 year initial dose study vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating The Safety , Tolerability And Immunogenicity Of A 13-Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine ( 13vPnC )
DOC.criteria: Male Female age 70 year old . Documented vaccination 1 dose 23vPS least 5 year previous . Healthy . Receipt one dose 23vPS prior enrollment . History severe adverse reaction vaccine . Immunodeficiency .
